findings.title: Outdated Compiler Version
findings.description: Using an outdated compiler version can be problematic especially if there are publicly disclosed bugs and issues that affect the current compiler version.

findings.title: Vulnerable approve function of ERC-20
findings.description: Attackers can spend approved tokens before the change of allowance value.

findings.title: Potential use of block.number as source of randomness
findings.description: The environment variable 'block.number' might be used as a source of randomness, which is predictable and can be manipulated by a malicious miner.

findings.title: Prefer external to public visibility level
findings.description: Functions with public visibility modifiers can be marked as external if they are never directly called by another function in the same contract or its descendants, which can reduce gas costs.
